column4: 10.04 or 10.10?  be sure to see this forum post (haven't finished it myself) http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1470822
be sure to see https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/nvidia-graphics-drivers/+bug/657634 as well :|
i like k3b (BUT that requires all the KDE libraries), gnomebaker is a popular gnome cd/dvd burner.
personally i'd recommend against brasero - but it's whatever works for you ;)
